job_tasks.phrase: Bouwen, implementeren en verbeteren van AI standaard oplossingen zoals ML/Deep learning/LLM/RAG oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development, implementation, and improvement of AI solutions involving ML, Deep Learning, LLM, and RAG, which are core modeling activities.
Building scripts for model training is a fundamental part of the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Het kunnen toepassen van verschillende vormen van Machine Learning in de contexten van: Beeldherkenning, Natural Language Processing, Spraakherkenning, Spraakgeneratie, Recommending Systems
job_tasks.justification: This lists various applications of machine learning models, directly relating to the application and development of models for specific tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: diep genoeg in de theorie zit om ML-modellen te kunnen maken en gebruiken
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the need for theoretical understanding to create and utilize ML models, a key aspect of the modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: implementeren ... van AI standaard oplossingen ... in nieuwe en bestaande applicaties (app, webservices, etc.)
job_tasks.justification: Implementing AI solutions into applications (apps, web services) falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: en het inbouwen hiervan in bestaande applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI models into existing applications is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Er is vertaling nodig van complexe Machine Learning naar bruikbare applicaties. ML-modellen zijn zelf niet zo heel bruikbaar als er geen applicatie omheen zit.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to build applications around ML models, which is a core software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: diep genoeg in applicatieontwikkeling om dit in een daadwerkelijke applicatie te bouwen
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the requirement for application development skills to build functional applications around ML.

job_tasks.phrase: ML is een heel ander vak dan normaal software engineering. Een 'normale' software engineer kun je dus niet inzetten om machine learning modellen en machine learning applicaties te maken.
job_tasks.justification: This clarifies that while ML is different, the creation of ML applications requires specific software engineering expertise beyond general programming.
Building data pipelines is a key component of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Verzamelen, opschonen en evalueren van data
job_tasks.justification: Collecting, cleaning, and evaluating data are fundamental data engineering tasks.
Establishing connections to data sources is part of data engineering for data access.

job_tasks.phrase: Je denkt mee met opdrachtgevers over het implementeren van machine learning modellen.
job_tasks.justification: Thinking along with clients about implementing ML models implies understanding their needs and aligning technical solutions with business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: implementatie en onderhoud van machine learning modellen
job_tasks.justification: Maintenance of ML models in production is a core aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Bereidheid tot het geven van presentaties, samen met de interne architect
job_tasks.justification: While not strictly development, presenting and collaborating with architects on implementations touches on the practical application and communication of developed solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: kennis van AI-gerelateerde aspecten zoals ethiek, uitlegbaarheid en transparantie in de context van AI
Bereidheid tot het geven van presentaties, samen met de interne architect
senior ontwikkelaar/machine learning engineer bij betrokken is voor de ontwikkeling, implementatie en onderhoud

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and implementing AI solutions, including LLMs and RAG, and integrating them into applications. It also mentions specific frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch within Python, alongside the need for translating ML concepts into usable applications and understanding AI ethics.
